name: Chronoclysm
description: A time paradox battle arena. Up to four mixed local / online players compete for victory while round after round their time compresses. Chaos and hilarity abound as rounds pile up, weaving time and players together.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista,7,8,10 Processor: 2.0ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2.5ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Knight: Fun and tanky but SLOW! Great for first timers.  Mage: Class cannon style. My favorite.  Builder: Reminds me of Minecraft + TF2.  BUG: In the tutorial you can map the same button for multiple actions. But easy enough to figure through. Should be fixed though.  BONUS: The tutorial shows an old school NES controller. It helps you figure out how to navigate, what to do, etc. Thumbs up for old school retro style!  I won this game (and 3 others) on a give-away. Glad I did, this game looks great!
